data.eml:eml: Revision of the Malagasy genus Lechius Iwan, 1995 (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae: Pedinini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Iwan, Dariusz, Kamiński, Marcin Jan (2012): Revision of the Malagasy genus Lechius Iwan, 1995 (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae: Pedinini). Zootaxa 3399: 23-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281839
